svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Average concentrations of suspended particulate matter (SPM), measured in micrograms per cubic metres in
London over the long-term and Delhi's more recent past.
Source: Fouquet (2011) and Government of India (2012-13)
